text: Pauli Arbarei (Paùli Arbarèi) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 616 people lived there. Its area is 15.14 km². It is 140 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Pauli Arbarei
